CKeyChooserWidget Class Reference

This class implements the KeyCooser Widget, which consists of a QComboBox unknown reference! , two normal ref @QToolButton and a enhanced cfx_btn. More...

class  CLexiconKeyChooser

Detailed Description

This class implements the KeyCooser Widget, which consists of a QComboBox unknown reference! , two normal ref @QToolButton and a enhanced cfx_btn.

Author(s):
The BibleTime team

Member Function Documentation

void CKeyChooserWidget::changeCombo ( int index ) [slot]

is called to move the combobox to a certain index.

Parameters:
index   the index to jump to

void CKeyChooserWidget::changed ( int index ) [signal]

Is emitted if the widget changed, but only if it is not locked or being reset.

Parameters:
the   current ComboBox index

void CKeyChooserWidget::init ( ) [virtual]

Initializes this widget.

We need this function because we have more than one constructor.

void CKeyChooserWidget::reset ( const int count,
int index,
bool do_emit )

This function does clear the combobox, then fill in the StringList, set the ComboBox' current item to index and if do_emit is true, it will emit changed().

Parameters:
list   the stringlist to be inserted
index   the index that the combobox is to jump to
do_emit   should we emit changed()(int)
